entry.title: Take the World and Redefine It

Author: Trying414

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,996Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 4

Summary: For the Maribat? Get In! Discord Civil War Event ~🦇🐞🦇~ It’s been two years since Mimi lost her memories, but she wasn’t letting that hold her back from living.
